transcript:
Hello.
Executive: Ha hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Yes sir ye Adarsh inme baat ho rahi hai sir meri.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Sir good afternoon main Sanjay baat kar raha hun India Mart Noida head office se.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ji main sir ab Adarsh Chaudhari sir baat kar rahe hain ya kaun baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ji actually sir maine call aapko isliye kiya hai ye profile sir backend pe meri team handle karti hai. Altamas hai Noida head office se jo aapke account manager hai aur unki jo manager hai Shruti hai sir. Mere paas sir ek feedback aaya tha over the mail theek hai ispe ye main mention hai we are registered on India Mart with the email address as Adarsh request you to appoint a field manager sir.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: To confirm karna chahunga sabse pehle to sir ye mail aap hi ne kara hai sir.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Okay sir ispe jo field manager hai sir matlab I mean to say ye aapne jo service li hai India Mart se currently theek hai that is on tele department.
Customer: That is on.
Executive: Aap jab that is on tele department. Okay theek hai tele department means ki aapko jo servicing milegi sir iske andar that is over the call.
Executive: Aur over the call mein in case agar koi client ko kisi bhi tarah ka koi bhi issue aa raha hai theek hai to hamari team sir yahan par ek video meeting support bhi deti hai. Jis like a physical meeting jaise aap samne karte hain theek hai just to know ki sir call pe samajh mein nahi aa raha hai aap ek bar jaise aap keh rahe hain na sir meeting ke regarding matlab indirectly physical meeting. Theek hai matlab koi banda physically bhejiye to hamari yahan par team available hai sir jo aapko properly over the video meeting mein connect karti hai apni official mail id se aur client ko koi bhi dikkat kahin par bhi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Us same time par issue resolve karke aapko deti hai sir. To main ek confirmation aapse sir ye chah raha tha iske andar ye jo aapne request forward kari hai sir what is the reason matlab kya reason hai sir matlab. Ek second rukiyega main concern person ko line pe le leta hun. Ji sir bilkul.
(silence)
Executive: Karta hun ek minute.
(silence)
Executive: 3:30 baje na.
(silence)
Customer: Are.
(silence)
(Caller Tune)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha hello.
Executive: Ha ji Harsh ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir boliyena. Ha ji sir sir main India Mart Noida head office se baat kar raha hun ye Adarsh steel ki jo profile hai sir ye backend se meri team handle karti hai main branch head baat kar raha hun Sanjay naam hai mera ek na sir mere paas ek mail aayi thi mail pe aapne likha hai please appoint a field manager.
Customer: Ha sir right main agenda sir pehli baat to confirm karna chahunga.
Executive: Agenda for appoint matlab agenda matlab jo aapne field manager appoint karne ke liye bola hai kya aapko tele service ke andar wo service nahi mil pa rahi hai matlab indirectly kuch bhi query matlab jo aap field manager demand kar rahe hain sir ek tarike se ye puchna chah raha hun.
Customer: Kyunki wo wahan se wo hota nahi hai kya bolte hain jo service chahiye wo service wahan se ho nahi pata hai jo aaj main offline field manager ko bata sakta hun wo main phone pe itna nahi samjha sakta na.
Executive: Achcha achcha main abhi jo Sanjay abhi aapko line pe connect kiya hai sir main unko yahi explain bhi kar raha tha pehli baat to sir ye hai ki jo jo abhi aapse connect kar raha hai na jin sir se jo abhi line mein bhi hai main unko already ye samjha raha tha abhi unhone fir aapko further connect kara hai ye jo service sir aapki chal rahi hai ye tele department ke andar hai theek hai jiske andar Noida head office se hamari teen higher ki hai yahan par theek hai jaise aapke manager hai Altamas unki manager hai Shruti aur unka manager hun main. Teeno higher ki aapko tele service hi de payegi sir isme. Dusra point agar aap keh rahe ho sir to ek cheez suniye suniye to sahi main aap hi ke point bata raha hun aapne ek point raise kiya hai sir ki jo solution mujhe chahiye chahe koi bhi dikkat agar aapko aa rahi hai ye over the call aap nahi samjha pate to is circumstance case ke upar sir hamari team aapse video meeting ke through bhi connect karti hai.
Customer: Ha ji.
Customer: Agar hum koi sir meri ek aur company bhi hai registered ke naam se aur ye Adarsh steel ki profile bhi main operate karta hun us location se jahan pe Shri steel ki servicing ke liye main samajh raha hun sir yahan par teen department hai hamare theek hai ek tele department hai jisme annual bhi ek client hai aur hamare paas monthly client bhi hai usme theek hai plus hamare paas wo support bhi hai jo aap keh rahe ho ha ji mere dono dono kya bolte hain ye hai annual subscription hi liya hua hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm to wahi to main keh raha hun aapki company kahan on board ho rahi hai aapki jis company yahan par on board ho rahi hai sir isliye wo tele department mein mujhe pata hai wo department jo aap kya bata rahe hain wo ek separate department hai wahan par but aapki company on board kahan hui wo matter karta hai sir iske andar but sir mujhe ek cheez please puchna chahunga ultimately meeting ka agenda aapke yahi hai na sir ki aap face to face ja ke koi bhi aapki query ya koi bhi issues hain samne baith ke discuss karna chah rahe the aap right ya karna chahte hain.
Customer: Yes yes yes correct mujhe aapka naam kya hai sir what's your good name.
Executive: Aman Aman ji Aman ji sir mujhe ek cheez bataiye kya yahan se kabhi aapne connect kara ho aur team aapko support in terms of video meeting ya samjha nahi pai hai to mujhe bataiye sir matlab mere paas bahut catalog mein catalog mapping mein jo keyword ka mapping karna hota hai aaj tak wo proper nahi ho rakha hai.
Customer: Okay ek keyword mapping aap bata rahe hain irrelevant inquiries agar mere consumption mein hai to aap bata do mere ko.
Executive: Theek hai ek keyword mapping aap bata rahe ho valid aap bata rahe ho iska aapko support nahi mila sir I will cut the conversation very short I need a field manager jo meri jis location pe hai usi pe mujhe servicing chahiye in person agar aap provide nahi kar sakte hain to aapke yahan se jis department ne phone kiya tha mujhe ek kisi lady staff ne connect kiya tha maine unko bola tha ki aap mujhe in writing mein mujhe mail pe dal dijiye usi mail pe revert ke sir hum aapko field manager appoint nahi karke de payenge to main bola theek hai maine unko bola tha mail dal dijiye wo mail abhi tak nahi aaya hai and if you cannot appoint a field manager to kindly mera kya bolte hain jo bhi balance hai mujhe aap refund kar dijiye and mera account close kar dijiye I am more than happy doing that.
Customer: Aapki sir dusri firm hai aapke department mein kitne teams hai aap mujhe online servicing de doge video call de doge google meet de doge mujhe sir wo sab further discuss hi nahi karna hai aaj jo cheez sir in person ho sakti hai wo in person hi ho sakti hai.
Executive: Aapki jo dusri company hai sir kya bataya aapne naam kya bataya dusri company ka aapki hi company hai.
Customer: Ha meri hi company hai. Uspe register mobile number kya hai sir aapka.
Executive: 7400 7400 410 hmm 762.
Executive: Jo aap hi ki hai right.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Aman Chaudhari aur sir isme Adarsh Chaudhari kaun hai matlab puchna jarur chahunga jaise isme Adarsh Chaudhari hai wahan par Aman Chaudhari hai.
Customer: That is not relevant at all sir aap call ko extend mat kijiye mujhe field manager chahiye aap de sakte hain to well and good nahi de sakte to mujhe aap black and white mein mail dal dijiye ke sir this is not possible and henceforth I will drop an email sir kindly close my account and refund the balance as of today itself aap mujhe mail dal dijiye main abhi ke abhi revert kar deta hun.
Executive: Theek hai sir main aapko ek bar update karta hun sir kuch time wo wo madam ne bhi mere ko bola tha update karta hun main unka branch abhi sir main main connect hi isliye kar raha hun madam ka hi update aaya tha aapki baat hui thi monday ko baat hui thi and aaj thursday ho gaya hai aap log internal aap logo ka internal communication itna strong nahi hai ki aap mujhe same day revert kar pao three days to aap logo ne nikal diye.
Executive: To mujhe kab milega email ye.
Executive: Sir mujhe aap time dijiye main check karke aapko update kar paunga sir kitna time abhi mujhe bhi aage by evening aaj aaj to nahi nahi sir by tomorrow evening main aap mujhe revert dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a field manager for servicing.

- Wants refund and account closure if not possible.

- Internal communication is not strong.

- Keyword mapping is not proper.



Resolution:

- Executive explained tele department services.

- Executive mentioned video meeting support.

- Executive asked for time to check and update.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update by tomorrow evening.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- field manager, refund, account closure, tele department, keyword mapping
